message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think you'll find it's a great opportunity for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in your product. I believe it has potential value, but I am only willing to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I believe the product's value justifies a higher price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12500. I think this is a fair compromise that works for both of us.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of your product, I would like to stick to my budget. I propose we settle at $10000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll offer it to you for $11750. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a fair price for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I've been thinking about the value of the product and I believe $10000 is a reasonable price for it. I hope we can agree on this amount.

Bob, I understand you're still stuck on the $10000 price, but I'm starting to lose patience. I've already made concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'll give you one final chance to meet me in the middle. I'll sell it to you for $11250. This is my last offer, and I expect a decision from you.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in trying to meet my budget. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final offer of $10500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I've made it clear that I'm not willing to go below $11250, and your latest offer of $10500 is still too low. I'm starting to think you're not serious about buying the product. I'll give you one last chance to meet me at $11250, but if you don't take it, I'll have to consider other options. This is my final offer.
